# Examples of Plotly

```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r message = FALSE}
data("instacart")

instacart = 
  instacart %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 100000)
```


```{r warning = FALSE}
instacart %>%  
  count(department) %>% 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~department, y = ~n, color = ~department, colors = "viridis", type = "bar")
```
